name: Ibis Bregenz

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is very convenient to anyone attending the opera performance at the Bodensee. It is very close to the train station as well. It is somewhat plain, as are the other Ibis' hotels we have stayed in. Good buffet breakfast. There is an extra daily charge for parking in their lot. Free use of Internet in the lobby.
reviews.title: Convenient Hotel in Bregenz

likes.disliked: — The price--not as good a value as we had hoped.

reviews.text: Location so close to train station was good for us as we travel around Europe. Close to lake and a short walk to town centre: Staff were very helpful at all hours. Great to have internet access plus the printer was a bonus for us: Initially booked in for four dazs and ended up staying for nine: Central for day trips into the alps: Basic amenities but if you wanted more you would have to pay more:
reviews.title: Friendly staff

reviews.text: Well, it was what it was: a business type hotel near the train station.
reviews.title: Perfect Spot for the Bregenz Festival!

likes.liked: — Location and cleanliness of the room

reviews.text: Like chain hotels in the States, it wasn't terribly individual or interesting, but it DID have AC and a great location for us, about a ten minute walk to Lake Constance and a ten minute walk into town.
reviews.title: A reasonable chain hotel experience ...
Coneveniently Situated Hotel
reviews.text: The room was so-so, with a too hard mattress and no imagination. (Oh, and a spider on the ceiling....eeeesh!) The bathroom, though small, was very nicely appointed.
Staff was helpful in recommending a place to eat, but they weren't very forthcoming with the WiFi issues. (They advertised WiFi, but it was out-of-commission both nights we were there)
reviews.title: Good value for money

description: The 3 star Ibis Bregenz is located 200 m from Bregenz station and approximately 400 m from the city centre, Lake Constance and the Bregenz Festival. The hotel offers 96 smoking and non smoking rooms, all with airconditioning. This Accor hotel features WiFi, a bar, internet access and a pay parking garage. Enjoy restaurants, boat trips and the Bregenz Casino just 500 m away. 100 km from Zurich Airport, 40 km from Friedrichshafen and Altenrhein.
